title: News organizations will solidify their moats — and build their bridges
description: The information landscape is changing once again: generative AI is transforming our relationship to data, discoverability, and content generation; social video and creator economies are reminding me of the early days of blogging; and we’re even rethinking hardware, with voice, AI, and AR interfaces in our glasses, homes, and wrists. Right now, news organizations are...
